ygData.subject: SV: [archive-crawler] Heritrix for unpacking WARC-Files
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Virginie. You need to include at least the fastutil-5.0.3-heritrix-subset-1.0.jar in your classpath bundled with the H1.14.4 distribution in the lib

Hi Virginie.
You need to include at least the fastutil-5.0.3-heritrix-subse=
t-1.0.jar in your classpath
bundled with the H1.14.4 distribution in the li=
b directory.

Best Regards
S=F8ren V. Carlsen, developer of NetarchiveSuite=
 

-----Oprindelig meddelelse-----
